All Creatures Great and Small
Series 2, 10 episodes, 3 discs, 1979-80
NOTE: For some odd reason episodes 11-14 is not included in this DVD release.
I've downloaded them and included them in this torrent, but without subs.
Thanks to original uploader sheila6 for episodes 11-14

All Creatures Great and Small is a British television series, based on the
books of the British veterinary surgeon Alf Wight, who wrote under the
pseudonym James Herriot.
